desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.jp: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<真理社>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<真理会>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理社的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真理会的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃的游戏存档不可恢复，桃听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.jp: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，真理社也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千禧年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，真理会也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.jp: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程部一起行动。

desc.en: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.jp: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是真理社的部长日鞠告诉她的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是贝里塔斯的部长阳葵告诉她的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是真理会的部长日鞠告诉她的。

desc.en: While Aris and Veritas create a distraction, Midori, Momoi, and Sensei attempt a frontal assault on Seminar.
desc.jp: While Aris and Veritas create a distraction, Midori, Momoi, and Sensei attempt a frontal assault on Seminar.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在爱丽丝和真理社成员进行佯攻作战的时候，绿、桃井和老师一起尝试正面突破研讨会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在爱丽丝和贝里塔斯成员进行佯攻作战的时候，绿、桃井和老师一起尝试正面突破研讨会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在爱丽丝和真理会成员进行佯攻作战的时候，绿、桃和老师一起尝试正面突破研讨会。

desc.en: Veritas' hacking ends up trapping Akane in a sealed room.
desc.jp: Veritas' hacking ends up trapping Akane in a sealed room.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于真理社暗中进行骇入行动，茜被困在密室里。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于贝里塔斯暗中进行骇入行动，朱音被困在密室里。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于真理会暗中进行骇入行动，茜被困在密室里。

desc.en: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝充当强行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。茜表示了对爱丽丝的喜欢。优香突然意识到其中的陷阱，嘱咐下属更换安保系统时避开由工程部研发的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝充当强行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。朱音表示了对爱丽丝的喜欢。优香突然意识到其中的陷阱，嘱咐下属更换安保系统时避开由工程师部研发的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝充当强行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。茜表示了对爱丽丝的喜欢。优香突然意识到其中的陷阱，嘱咐下属更换安保系统时避开由工程部研发的。

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.
desc.jp: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时真理社即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时真理会即可开始骇入。

desc.en: Akane thought herself would be meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.jp: Akane thought herself would be meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜以为碰见了桃井和绿，实际上却是工程部的真纪与柯托莉。茜向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音以为碰见了桃井和绿，实际上却是工程师部的真纪与亚都梨。朱音向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜以为碰见了桃和绿，实际上却是工程部的真纪与琴里。茜向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka was too late to realize the trap set by Aris. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they still met other Seminar members.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka was too late to realize the trap set by Aris. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they still met other Seminar members.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时茜等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃井、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。

desc.en: Though the door stayed closed and unable to contact Asuna, Akane received a message from another partner - Karin. She confirmed that the Game Development Department members had already within the shooting range.
desc.jp: Though the door stayed closed and unable to contact Asuna, Akane received a message from another partner - Karin. She confirmed that the Game Development Department members had already within the shooting range.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 闸门虽无法打开，也联系不上明日奈，但这时茜收到了另一位同伴的消息——花凛确认，游戏开发部成员已进入射击范围。

desc.en: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris came to the rescue and succeeded in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.jp: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris came to the rescue and succeeded in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.jp: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程师部无力压制狙击手花凛，朱音也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates zero failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.jp: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates zero failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.zh_cn: 众人认为计划的容错率完全为零，因而需要准备后备计划。停电后，爱丽丝检测到时机成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers with Sword of Light; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.jp: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers with Sword of Light; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.zh_cn: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。

desc.en: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.jp: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 有一天，老师从真理社接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往真理社部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 有一天，老师从真理会接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往真理会部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。

desc.en: Veritas contacted Sensei directly and said they found a strange stuff. Since no one knew it at Millennium, they asked Sensei to come over and have a look.
desc.jp: Veritas contacted Sensei directly and said they found a strange stuff. Since no one knew it at Millennium, they asked Sensei to come over and have a look.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理社直接联系了老师，说他们找到了一样奇怪的东西。因为问过的人都没见过，所以希望老师来一趟看看。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 贝里塔斯直接联系了老师，说他们找到了一样奇怪的东西。因为问过的人都没见过，所以希望老师来一趟看看。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真理会直接联系了老师，说他们找到了一样奇怪的东西。因为问过的人都没见过，所以希望老师来一趟看看。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Before the club room, Sensei found the Game Development Department was invited too. The four said they were coming to seek some inspirations, though Yuzu was pretty uncomfortable to get outside. At the club room, Hare showed everyone a strange-looking robot.
desc.jp: Before the club room, Sensei found the Game Development Department was invited too. The four said they were coming to seek some inspirations, though Yuzu was pretty uncomfortable to get outside. At the club room, Hare showed everyone a strange-looking robot.
desc.zh_cn: 老师到门口时，发现游戏开发部也受到了邀请。开发部四人表示是为了寻找灵感而来，虽然让一直待在柜子里的柚子相当不舒服。进去后，晴向众人展示了一个奇怪的机器人。

desc.en: The Veritas explained that the robots were from the outskirts of the Millennium, with a number totaling more than 20. Momoi was grealy surprised at the sight of it. Veritas tried to start it but failed every time - when Aris began reacting to the robot.
desc.jp: The Veritas explained that the robots were from the outskirts of the Millennium, with a number totaling more than 20. Momoi was grealy surprised at the sight of it. Veritas tried to start it but failed every time - when Aris began reacting to the robot.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理社众人向大家解释，这些机器人来自千禧年郊外，且数量超过二十台以上。桃井等人大受震撼。真理社曾尝试使其启动但都以失败告终——就在这时，爱丽丝突然对这个东西有了反应。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 贝里塔斯众人向大家解释，这些机器人来自千年郊外，且数量超过二十台以上。桃井等人大受震撼。贝里塔斯曾尝试使其启动但都以失败告终——就在这时，爱丽丝突然对这个东西有了反应。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真理会众人向大家解释，这些机器人来自千年郊外，且数量超过二十台以上。桃等人大受震撼。真理会曾尝试使其启动但都以失败告终——就在这时，爱丽丝突然对这个东西有了反应。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: The robot, alongside Momoi's game console carrying G.Bible, started operating after interacting with Aris. All panicking, Aris suddenly announced that the "AL-1S" completed the booting, and began attacking everyone.
desc.jp: The robot, alongside Momoi's game console carrying G.Bible, started operating after interacting with Aris. All panicking, Aris suddenly announced that the "AL-1S" completed the booting, and began attacking everyone.
desc.zh_cn: 与爱丽丝接触后的机器人开始启动，而众人也发现之前装载着G.Bible的游戏机也一并启动。就在众人不知所措时，爱丽丝突然宣布“AL-1S”启动完成，并对在场众人发起攻击。
举例/联想：Let me think about it
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Rio's victory is sealed in front of Himari, but Himari succeeds in escaping with Eimi's help. Meanwhile, cut off from Veritas's support, the Game Development Department find themselves with their backs against the wall until they are dramatically rescued by Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas.
desc.jp: Rio's victory is sealed in front of Himari, but Himari succeeds in escaping with Eimi's help. Meanwhile, cut off from Veritas's support, the Game Development Department find themselves with their backs against the wall until they are dramatically rescued by Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在莉央笃定自己能获胜时，日鞠在英美的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了真理社支持的游戏开发部面临空前的危机，真理社的副部长千寻在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在莉音笃定自己能获胜时，阳葵在英美的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了贝里塔斯支持的游戏开发部面临空前的危机，贝里塔斯的副部长千寻在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在莉央笃定自己能获胜时，日鞠在英美的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了真理会支持的游戏开发部面临空前的危机，真理会的副部长千寻在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。

desc.en: Neru and Toki were at a deadlock. The GDD was no match of the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: Neru and Toki were at a deadlock. The GDD was no match of the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄与时陷入僵局，争执不下。游戏开发部一行人不敌前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠与季陷入僵局，争执不下。游戏开发部一行人不敌前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露与时陷入僵局，争执不下。游戏开发部一行人不敌前卫君。

desc.en: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, saying that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed with Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never-looking-back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. She asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.jp: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, saying that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed with Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never-looking-back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. She asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央向日鞠讲述了自己计划的当前进度。日鞠对莉央计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉央的本来目的。日鞠表示莉央“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉央“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉央正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音向阳葵讲述了自己计划的当前进度。阳葵对莉音计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉音的本来目的。阳葵表示莉音“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉音“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉音正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央向日鞠讲述了自己计划的当前进度。日鞠对莉央计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉央的本来目的。日鞠表示莉央“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉央“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉央正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her calculation It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.jp: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her calculation It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是日鞠社团里的后辈英美前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。英美承认这么做对其他人意义并不是很大，但日鞠则表示她信任她的后辈们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是阳葵社团里的后辈英美前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。英美承认这么做对其他人意义并不是很大，但阳葵则表示她信任她的后辈们。

desc.en: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was displaying something.
desc.jp: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was displaying something.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在真理社因通讯被意外中断、无论如何都无法连接上，无从下手而抓狂时，所有人却突然发现屏幕有了动静。

desc.en: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.jp: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千禧年的学生成功击败了时，代号Double O的尼禄的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千年的学生成功击败了季，代号Double O的宁瑠的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千年的学生成功击败了时，代号Double O的妮露的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。

desc.en: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.
desc.jp: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C一行人继续与时和她的机甲战斗。时起初非常自信，但很快发现自己的攻击似乎也开始无效化。C&C开始以直觉统筹战斗，最终将时逼进了室内。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C一行人继续与季和她的机甲战斗。季起初非常自信，但很快发现自己的攻击似乎也开始无效化。C&C开始以直觉统筹战斗，最终将季逼进了室内。

desc.en: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.jp: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但尼禄不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。茜担心尼禄身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但宁瑠不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。朱音担心宁瑠身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。

desc.en: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. Dust settled, even Rio was surprised by her own irrational choice, but still claimed that the probability of Sensei's winning was nearly zero. She also didn't understand why anyone would keep fighting with that in mind, but Akane explained it clear and loud: Sensei never, and ever, talked about the probability of winning.
desc.jp: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. Dust settled, even Rio was surprised by her own irrational choice, but still claimed that the probability of Sensei's winning was nearly zero. She also didn't understand why anyone would keep fighting with that in mind, but Akane explained it clear and loud: Sensei never, and ever, talked about the probability of winning.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉央授权时发射主炮，将尼禄打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉央也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。茜则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉音授权季发射主炮，将宁瑠打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉音也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。朱音则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉央授权时发射主炮，将妮露打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉央也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。茜则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

name.en: As Long As She Got Rescued
name.jp: As Long As She Got Rescued

desc.en: Akane was still very worried about Neru's physical conditions, but Neru simply didn't care. All she wanted is to rescue Aris - and when Aris' rescued, they won. Akane was surprised by this, but expressed her understanding, saying they were just like "the protagonists in a game". Akane also mentioned that Neru had a code name "OO" as well - a victory symbol for Millennium - as well.
desc.jp: Akane was still very worried about Neru's physical conditions, but Neru simply didn't care. All she wanted is to rescue Aris - and when Aris' rescued, they won. Akane was surprised by this, but expressed her understanding, saying they were just like "the protagonists in a game". Akane also mentioned that Neru had a code name "OO" as well - a victory symbol for Millennium - as well.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜仍然对尼禄的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但尼禄并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。茜对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。茜同时还向莉央提到，尼禄可是有代号为“OO”——千禧年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音仍然对宁瑠的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但宁瑠并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。朱音对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。朱音同时还向莉音提到，宁瑠可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜仍然对妮露的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但妮露并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。茜对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。茜同时还向莉央提到，妮露可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Neru got up from the ground, while Veritas had successfully hacked the freight elevator. They forced Toki into the elevator - a thing that Momoi had talked before. It was only then that Rio realized their plan - to use the elevator to ineffective the system - but was too late. With the acceleration speed of 10x the gravity, Toki was no way winning. Rio was impressed by "OO".
desc.jp: Neru got up from the ground, while Veritas had successfully hacked the freight elevator. They forced Toki into the elevator - a thing that Momoi had talked before. It was only then that Rio realized their plan - to use the elevator to ineffective the system - but was too late. With the acceleration speed of 10x the gravity, Toki was no way winning. Rio was impressed by "OO".
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄从地上爬起，真理社也已经成功骇入货梯。众人将时逼进货梯——正是桃井曾提出的游戏方案。这时莉央才意识到了众人的计划——用电梯来压制系统——但为时已晚。在真理社特别设定的十倍重力加速度下，时和她的机甲直接被吊打。莉央感慨“OO”的强大。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠从地上爬起，贝里塔斯也已经成功骇入货梯。众人将季逼进货梯——正是桃井曾提出的游戏方案。这时莉音才意识到了众人的计划——用电梯来压制系统——但为时已晚。在贝里塔斯特别设定的十倍重力加速度下，季和她的机甲直接被吊打。莉音感慨“OO”的强大。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露从地上爬起，真理会也已经成功骇入货梯。众人将时逼进货梯——正是桃曾提出的游戏方案。这时莉央才意识到了众人的计划——用电梯来压制系统——但为时已晚。在真理会特别设定的十倍重力加速度下，时和她的机甲直接被吊打。莉央感慨“OO”的强大。

desc.en: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程部和真理社等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在日鞠的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程师部和贝里塔斯等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在阳葵的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程部和真理会等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃、绿、柚子、老师企图在日鞠的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。

desc.en: Noa explained that Yuuka didn't feel well after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka lectured Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Noa explained that Yuuka didn't feel well after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka lectured Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 乃爱解释称，优香觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。优香呵斥了莉央，说明会严厉追究她的责任。工程部此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和工程部干扰。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 乃爱解释称，优香觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。优香呵斥了莉音，说明会严厉追究她的责任。工程师部此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和工程师部干扰。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 乃爱解释称，优香觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。优香呵斥了莉央，说明会严厉追究她的责任。工程部此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和工程部干扰。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.
desc.jp: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在Key以为仍有机会时，日鞠突然出现并解释C&C和英美已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。莉央惊讶于日鞠竟未逃走，而日鞠则表示早已对此有所预料。

desc.en: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.
desc.jp: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，日鞠提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉央指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千禧年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，日鞠开始寻找其中的突破口。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，阳葵提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉音指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，阳葵开始寻找其中的突破口。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，日鞠提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉央指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，日鞠开始寻找其中的突破口。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.

desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 法蘭西斯突然到訪，指出老師的力量將不再發揮作用，因為老師所處的故事的一切已經被推翻、破壞，老師不再是故事的主角。一切都將不復存在，一切都將成為沒有意義而無法理解的世界。他指出老師的故事已經結束，所要發生的將不再是故事。
desc.jp: 法蘭西斯突然到訪，指出老師的力量將不再發揮作用，因為老師所處的故事的一切已經被推翻、破壞，老師不再是故事的主角。一切都將不復存在，一切都將成為沒有意義而無法理解的世界。他指出老師的故事已經結束，所要發生的將不再是故事。
desc.zh_cn: 法兰西斯突然到访，指出老师的力量将不再发挥作用，因为老师所处的故事的一切已经被推翻、破坏，老师不再是故事的主角。一切都将不复存在，一切都将成为没有意义而无法理解的世界。他指出老师的故事已经结束，所要发生的将不再是故事。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 彩奈告訴老師，她已成功聯絡所有學生。
desc.jp: 彩奈告訴老師，她已成功聯絡所有學生。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜告诉老师，她已成功联络所有学生。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈告诉老师，她已成功联络所有学生。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阿洛娜告诉老师，她已成功联络所有学生。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 沙織的加入讓聚集在一起的奧利斯小隊也迴應了老師的召集。修女會和救護騎士團在第4聖所待機。儘管攻略第5聖所的過程中遇到了困境，但後來溫泉開發部和被釋放的小雪伸出了援手。接著第6聖所也完成了居民的避難處理。仁耶向忍術研究部轉達前往雪原搜尋百花繚亂部長的任務。
desc.jp: 沙織的加入讓聚集在一起的奧利斯小隊也迴應了老師的召集。修女會和救護騎士團在第4聖所待機。儘管攻略第5聖所的過程中遇到了困境，但後來溫泉開發部和被釋放的小雪伸出了援手。接著第6聖所也完成了居民的避難處理。仁耶向忍術研究部轉達前往雪原搜尋百花繚亂部長的任務。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 纱织的加入让聚集在一起的阿里乌斯战术小队也回应了老师的召集。姐妹会和救护骑士团在第4圣所待机。尽管攻略第5圣所的过程中遇到了困境，但后来温泉开发部和被释放的小雪伸出了援手。接着第6圣所也完成了居民的避难处理。仁耶向忍术研究部转达前往雪原搜索百花缭乱部长的任务。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 沙织的加入让聚集在一起的奥利斯小队也回应了老师的召集。修女会和救护骑士团在第4圣所待机。尽管攻略第5圣所的过程中遇到了困境，但后来温泉开发部和被释放的小雪伸出了援手。接着第6圣所也完成了居民的避难处理。仁耶向忍术研究部转达前往雪原搜索百花缭乱部长的任务。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 纱织的加入让聚集在一起的阿里乌斯小队也回应了老师的召集。修女会和救护骑士团在第4圣所待机。尽管攻略第5圣所的过程中遇到了困境，但后来温泉开发部和被释放的小雪伸出了援手。接着第6圣所也完成了居民的避难处理。仁耶向忍术研究部转达前往雪原搜索百花缭乱部长的任务。

desc.en: 貝裡塔斯回報稱，由於霍德鑽進了堡壘都市地下，而那裡被莉音的系統保護著，無法探測；他們正在破譯密碼，但耗時會比較長。真紀聽後有點驚訝，但乃愛讓真紀繼續專注於第一聖所。
desc.jp: 貝裡塔斯回報稱，由於霍德鑽進了堡壘都市地下，而那裡被莉音的系統保護著，無法探測；他們正在破譯密碼，但耗時會比較長。真紀聽後有點驚訝，但乃愛讓真紀繼續專注於第一聖所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理社回报称，由于霍德钻进了堡垒都市地下，而那里被莉央的系统保护着，无法探测；他们正在破译密码，但耗时会比较长。真纪听后有点惊讶，但诺亚让真纪继续专注于第一圣所。

desc.en: 陽葵突然接入通訊，表示她記得曾經有人偽造過千年的債券，而相關的系統就是由莉音設計。千尋以為是陽葵所作，但後者表示另有其人。乃愛聽後呼叫了優香，而優香讓乃愛來一趟反省室。
desc.jp: 陽葵突然接入通訊，表示她記得曾經有人偽造過千年的債券，而相關的系統就是由莉音設計。千尋以為是陽葵所作，但後者表示另有其人。乃愛聽後呼叫了優香，而優香讓乃愛來一趟反省室。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠突然接入通讯，表示她记得曾经有人伪造过千禧年的债券，而相关的系统就是由莉央设计。千寻以为是日鞠所作，但后者表示另有其人。诺亚听后呼叫了优香，而优香让诺亚来一趟反省室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵突然接入通讯，表示她记得曾经有人伪造过千年的债券，而相关的系统就是由莉音设计。千寻以为是阳葵所作，但后者表示另有其人。乃爱听后呼叫了优香，而优香让乃爱来一趟反省室。

desc.en: 雖然嘗試攻擊推測是誘騙者所在的地方，但利用目前的攻擊方式根本就無法造成傷害。老師遇見了黑色西裝人，從對方口中得知可以觸及誘騙者的方法。
desc.jp: 雖然嘗試攻擊推測是誘騙者所在的地方，但利用目前的攻擊方式根本就無法造成傷害。老師遇見了黑色西裝人，從對方口中得知可以觸及誘騙者的方法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然尝试攻击推测是诱骗者所在的地方，但利用目前的攻击方式根本就无法造成伤害。老师遇见了黑色西服人，从对方口中得知可以触及诱骗者的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然尝试攻击推测是诱骗者所在的地方，但利用目前的攻击方式根本就无法造成伤害。老师遇见了黑色西装人，从对方口中得知可以触及诱骗者的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然尝试攻击推测是诱骗者所在的地方，但利用目前的攻击方式根本就无法造成伤害。老师遇见了黑色西服人，从对方口中得知可以触及诱骗者的方法。

desc.en: 陽葵和千尋對能量中心點居然能在這麼高的地方出現而感到驚奇。陽葵表示大家沒有能力能夠到達那個高度，而且也由於其外層被一層膜保護而無法探測。
desc.jp: 陽葵和千尋對能量中心點居然能在這麼高的地方出現而感到驚奇。陽葵表示大家沒有能力能夠到達那個高度，而且也由於其外層被一層膜保護而無法探測。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠和千寻对能量中心点居然能在这么高的地方出现而感到惊奇。日鞠表示大家没有能力能够到达那个高度，而且也由于其外层被一层膜保护而无法探测。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠和千寻对能量中心点居然能在这么高的地方出现而感到惊奇。日鞠表示大家没有能力能够到达那个高度，而且也由于其外层被一层膜保护而无法探测。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 花子指出，無論是聖所還是天上的那個能量體，似乎都表明他們存在一種“共存狀態”。更準確的說，這是“多次元詮釋”――那個空間將一切的可能都糅合到了一起，形成一種混沌共存的狀態。在這種情況下，基沃託斯所在的“確定的世界”無法加以干涉。
desc.jp: 花子指出，無論是聖所還是天上的那個能量體，似乎都表明他們存在一種“共存狀態”。更準確的說，這是“多次元詮釋”――那個空間將一切的可能都糅合到了一起，形成一種混沌共存的狀態。在這種情況下，基沃託斯所在的“確定的世界”無法加以干涉。
desc.zh_cn: 花子指出，无论是圣所还是天上的那个能量体，似乎都表明他们存在一种“共存状态”。更准确的说，这是“多次元诠释”――那个空间将一切的可能都糅合到了一起，形成一种混沌共存的状态。在这种情况下，基沃托斯所在的“确定的世界”无法加以干涉。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 然而，花子也指出，她推測或許只有外面的一層是處於這種情況，否則內部無法向地面的聖所傳遞能量。從這個角度出發，只要能夠破壞保護膜，對其本體應當就能發起攻擊。
desc.jp: 然而，花子也指出，她推測或許只有外面的一層是處於這種情況，否則內部無法向地面的聖所傳遞能量。從這個角度出發，只要能夠破壞保護膜，對其本體應當就能發起攻擊。
desc.zh_cn: 然而，花子也指出，她推测或许只有外面的一层是处于这种情况，否则内部无法向地面的圣所传递能量。从这个角度出发，只要能够破坏保护膜，对其本体应当就能发起攻击。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: 為了對保護罩加以干涉，就必須要使他們處於和保護罩一樣的情況。花子指出，他們可以將這種達到“共存狀態”的過程理解為“使物體與之共振”的概念――但那需要進行多次元詮釋，而只有量子電腦能做得到。
desc.jp: 為了對保護罩加以干涉，就必須要使他們處於和保護罩一樣的情況。花子指出，他們可以將這種達到“共存狀態”的過程理解為“使物體與之共振”的概念――但那需要進行多次元詮釋，而只有量子電腦能做得到。
desc.zh_cn: 为了对保护罩加以干涉，就必须要使他们处于和保护罩一样的情况。花子指出，他们可以将这种达到“共存状态”的过程理解为“使物体与之共振”的概念――但那需要进行多次元诠释，而只有量子电脑能做得到。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 事態並沒有向好的方向發展。眾人意識到，如果不摧毀本體，聖所之塔就會一直出現――優香抱怨這種事完全違反熱力學第一定律，不過佳世子則指出，畢竟是囊括了一切可能性的“多次元”空間。
desc.jp: 事態並沒有向好的方向發展。眾人意識到，如果不摧毀本體，聖所之塔就會一直出現――優香抱怨這種事完全違反熱力學第一定律，不過佳世子則指出，畢竟是囊括了一切可能性的“多次元”空間。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事态并没有向好的方向发展。众人意识到，如果不摧毁本体，圣所之塔就会一直出现――优香抱怨这种事完全违反热力学第一定律，不过佳代子则指出，毕竟是囊括了一切可能性的“多次元”空间。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 事态并没有向好的方向发展。众人意识到，如果不摧毁本体，圣所之塔就会一直出现――优香抱怨这种事完全违反热力学第一定律，不过佳世子则指出，毕竟是囊括了一切可能性的“多次元”空间。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 事态并没有向好的方向发展。众人意识到，如果不摧毁本体，圣所之塔就会一直出现――优香抱怨这种事完全违反热力学第一定律，不过佳代子则指出，毕竟是囊括了一切可能性的“多次元”空间。

desc.en: 老師去找了黑服。黑服說當然有，而且憑藉那個東西可能真能到達能量體所在的高空。黑服問老師願意付出什麼代價，不過他立刻明白了老師此行就是不惜一切代價。黑服開玩笑，建議老師加入蓋瑪特利亞，不過立刻表示這一組織已經解散。
desc.jp: 老師去找了黑服。黑服說當然有，而且憑藉那個東西可能真能到達能量體所在的高空。黑服問老師願意付出什麼代價，不過他立刻明白了老師此行就是不惜一切代價。黑服開玩笑，建議老師加入蓋瑪特利亞，不過立刻表示這一組織已經解散。
desc.zh_cn: 老师去找了黑服。黑服说当然有，而且凭借那个东西可能真能到达能量体所在的高空。黑服问老师愿意付出什么代价，不过他立刻明白了老师此行就是不惜一切代价。黑服开玩笑，建议老师加入盖玛特利亚，不过立刻表示这一组织已经解散。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 因為組織解散，黑服決定跟老師特別說明一次，但警告老師可能會在使用時喪命――老師無畏一切。
desc.jp: 因為組織解散，黑服決定跟老師特別說明一次，但警告老師可能會在使用時喪命――老師無畏一切。
desc.zh_cn: 因为组织解散，黑服决定跟老师特别说明一次，但警告老师可能会在使用时丧命――老师无畏一切。

desc.en: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.jp: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 琳宣布枫香同学正式负责船上的餐饮供给，同时一同到来的还有美食研究会。枫香对莫名其妙来到这里有些不满，但美食研究会解释称这是为了尝到“太空美食”――虽然这番说辞对枫香而言并没有什么吸引力。亚伽里同时提到为了以防万一，他们顺便还把供餐部的小车也给拿上来了。众人的期望和兴致都很高。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 琳宣布风华同学正式负责船上的餐饮供给，同时一同到来的还有美食研究会。风华对莫名其妙来到这里有些不满，但美食研究会解释称这是为了尝到“太空美食”――虽然这番说辞对风华而言并没有什么吸引力。亚伽里同时提到为了以防万一，他们顺便还把供给部的小车也给拿上来了。众人的期望和兴致都很高。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 琳宣布风香同学正式负责船上的餐饮供给，同时一同到来的还有美食研究会。风香对莫名其妙来到这里有些不满，但美食研究会解释称这是为了尝到“太空美食”――虽然这番说辞对风香而言并没有什么吸引力。明里同时提到为了以防万一，他们顺便还把供餐部的小车也给拿上来了。众人的期望和兴致都很高。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.jp: 老師想起來與黑服的對話，其中黑服表示強行啟動戰艦將可能導致老師的肉體受到損害。
desc.zh_cn: 老师想起来与黑服的对话，其中黑服表示强行启动战舰将可能导致老师的肉体受到损害。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.en: 黑服在與老師的交流中提到，即便老師這麼去做了，命運的歸宿最終仍會讓基沃託斯到達終結，就像白子那一般。黑服無法理解老師為何在一個命運已經決定的世界裡奮力掙扎到這種地步。
desc.jp: 黑服在與老師的交流中提到，即便老師這麼去做了，命運的歸宿最終仍會讓基沃託斯到達終結，就像白子那一般。黑服無法理解老師為何在一個命運已經決定的世界裡奮力掙扎到這種地步。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服在与老师的交流中提到，即便老师这么去做了，命运的归宿最终仍会让基沃托斯到达终结，就像白子那一般。黑服无法理解老师为何在一个命运已经决定的世界里奋力挣扎到这种地步。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 老師對彩奈問題的回答是――這是作為大人的責任。
desc.jp: 老師對彩奈問題的回答是――這是作為大人的責任。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师对阿罗娜问题的回答是――这是作为大人的责任。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师对彩奈问题的回答是――这是作为大人的责任。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师对阿洛娜问题的回答是――这是作为大人的责任。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 黑服追問老師他是否是真的會不惜一切代價，老師堅定的回答了“是”。
desc.jp: 黑服追問老師他是否是真的會不惜一切代價，老師堅定的回答了“是”。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服追问老师他是否是真的会不惜一切代价，老师坚定的回答了“是”。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 老師內心做著激烈的鬥爭，琳把老師拉回現實。老師詢問琳當時是如何回答會長關於“第二項古則”的問題的――更準確的來說，琳是如何填空的。
desc.jp: 老師內心做著激烈的鬥爭，琳把老師拉回現實。老師詢問琳當時是如何回答會長關於“第二項古則”的問題的――更準確的來說，琳是如何填空的。
desc.zh_cn: 老师内心做着激烈的斗争，琳把老师拉回现实。老师询问琳当时是如何回答会长关于“第二项古则”的问题的――更准确的来说，琳是如何填空的。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: 會長相信，琳與她之間無法互相理解、無法觸及彼此而只能走在各自的道路上，是一種天意。會長很喜歡琳完成的句子：透過無法理解的他人（事物），是否能夠理解自己（彼此）呢？
desc.jp: 會長相信，琳與她之間無法互相理解、無法觸及彼此而只能走在各自的道路上，是一種天意。會長很喜歡琳完成的句子：透過無法理解的他人（事物），是否能夠理解自己（彼此）呢？
desc.zh_cn: 会长相信，琳与她之间无法互相理解、无法触及彼此而只能走在各自的道路上，是一种天意。会长很喜欢琳完成的句子：通过无法理解的他人（事物），是否能够理解自己（彼此）呢？

desc.en: 利用箱子的力量，老師成功啟動了戰艦，一切都在按照手冊和計劃上的執行著。老師下令戰艦正式啟航，綾音報告戰艦準備離地。
desc.jp: 利用箱子的力量，老師成功啟動了戰艦，一切都在按照手冊和計劃上的執行著。老師下令戰艦正式啟航，綾音報告戰艦準備離地。
desc.zh_cn: 利用箱子的力量，老师成功启动了战舰，一切都在按照手册和计划上的执行着。老师下令战舰正式启航，绫音报告战舰准备离地。

desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 在獲得Kei的力量後進行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守護者就這樣全速向前進，成功進入了方舟的內部。
desc.jp: 在獲得Kei的力量後進行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守護者就這樣全速向前進，成功進入了方舟的內部。
desc.zh_cn: 在获得Kei的力量后进行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守护者就这样全速向前进，成功进入了方舟的内部。

desc.en: 莉音進一步解釋，愛麗絲的方舟與防護罩是同一種東西，因而這並非某種“複製”，應該能夠對其造成干涉。陽葵指出方舟的形態依建造者決定，顯然莉音的是一個堡壘都市，不過愛麗絲的嘛……
desc.jp: 莉音進一步解釋，愛麗絲的方舟與防護罩是同一種東西，因而這並非某種“複製”，應該能夠對其造成干涉。陽葵指出方舟的形態依建造者決定，顯然莉音的是一個堡壘都市，不過愛麗絲的嘛……
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央进一步解释，爱丽丝的方舟与防护罩是同一种东西，因而这并非某种“复制”，应该能够对其造成干涉。日鞠指出方舟的形态依建造者决定，显然莉央的是一个堡垒都市，不过爱丽丝的嘛……
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音进一步解释，爱丽丝的方舟与防护罩是同一种东西，因而这并非某种“复制”，应该能够对其造成干涉。阳葵指出方舟的形态依建造者决定，显然莉音的是一个堡垒都市，不过爱丽丝的嘛……
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央进一步解释，爱丽丝的方舟与防护罩是同一种东西，因而这并非某种“复制”，应该能够对其造成干涉。日鞠指出方舟的形态依建造者决定，显然莉央的是一个堡垒都市，不过爱丽丝的嘛……

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。

desc.en: 命中的一炮產生了反向衝擊波。衝擊波後，艦長七神琳下令方舟以最大速度前進，試圖突破防護罩。碰撞後，綾音立刻減速。隨後與方舟本體發生碰撞，眾人成功突入進方舟內部。
desc.jp: 命中的一炮產生了反向衝擊波。衝擊波後，艦長七神琳下令方舟以最大速度前進，試圖突破防護罩。碰撞後，綾音立刻減速。隨後與方舟本體發生碰撞，眾人成功突入進方舟內部。
desc.zh_cn: 命中的一炮产生了反向冲击波。冲击波后，舰长七神琳下令方舟以最大速度前进，试图突破防护罩。碰撞后，绫音立刻减速。随后与方舟本体发生碰撞，众人成功突入进方舟内部。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 聽到此種讚賞，莉音突然情緒崩潰，離開了通訊，自己在某處辦公室的桌子下抱著頭。
desc.jp: 聽到此種讚賞，莉音突然情緒崩潰，離開了通訊，自己在某處辦公室的桌子下抱著頭。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 听到此种赞赏，莉央突然情绪崩溃，离开了通讯，自己在某处办公室的桌子下抱着头。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 听到此种赞赏，莉音突然情绪崩溃，离开了通讯，自己在某处办公室的桌子下抱着头。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 听到此种赞赏，莉央突然情绪崩溃，离开了通讯，自己在某处办公室的桌子下抱着头。

desc.en: Kei與愛麗絲回到了最一開始她們被找到的那個廢墟里。愛麗絲向Kei告別，隨後倒地失去意識――但被Kei及時摟住。Kei這時完全理解了愛麗絲的“勇者”與“勇氣”究竟為何物，並以自己，一個武器，的消失作為代價，救回了愛麗絲；自己卻變成了一個小機器人。
desc.jp: Kei與愛麗絲回到了最一開始她們被找到的那個廢墟里。愛麗絲向Kei告別，隨後倒地失去意識――但被Kei及時摟住。Kei這時完全理解了愛麗絲的“勇者”與“勇氣”究竟為何物，並以自己，一個武器，的消失作為代價，救回了愛麗絲；自己卻變成了一個小機器人。
desc.zh_cn: Kei与爱丽丝回到了最一开始她们被找到的那个废墟里。爱丽丝向Kei告别，随后倒地失去意识――但被Kei及时搂住。Kei这时完全理解了爱丽丝的“勇者”与“勇气”究竟为何物，并以自己，一个武器，的消失作为代价，救回了爱丽丝；自己却变成了一个小机器人。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

name.jp: 阿特拉哈西斯的方舟佔領戰
name.zh_cn: 阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战

desc.en: 成功擊退包圍船的敵人後，白子隨著爆炸出現在老師的面前。同一時間，對策委員會的所有人都出現在白子的面前，白子有些驚訝且立刻逃走了。在防禦生命守護者主艦的同時，也展開了阿特拉哈西斯方舟的佔領戰。
desc.jp: 成功擊退包圍船的敵人後，白子隨著爆炸出現在老師的面前。同一時間，對策委員會的所有人都出現在白子的面前，白子有些驚訝且立刻逃走了。在防禦生命守護者主艦的同時，也展開了阿特拉哈西斯方舟的佔領戰。
desc.zh_cn: 成功击退包围船的敌人后，白子随着爆炸出现在老师的面前。同一时间，对策委员会的所有人都出现在白子的面前，白子有些惊讶且立刻逃走了。在防御生命守护者主舰的同时，也展开了阿特拉哈西斯方舟的占领战。

desc.en: 戰鬥非常成功，但就在眾人以為一切結束時，爆炸突然發生在船艦內。
desc.jp: 戰鬥非常成功，但就在眾人以為一切結束時，爆炸突然發生在船艦內。
desc.zh_cn: 战斗非常成功，但就在众人以为一切结束时，爆炸突然发生在船舰内。

desc.en: 另一位白子對老師居然能到達這裡感到驚奇，但同時也警告老師。綾音大聲叫喊，讓對策委員會一行人前來抓住白子，但白子見狀後以手榴彈為掩護，立刻跑掉了。
desc.jp: 另一位白子對老師居然能到達這裡感到驚奇，但同時也警告老師。綾音大聲叫喊，讓對策委員會一行人前來抓住白子，但白子見狀後以手榴彈為掩護，立刻跑掉了。
desc.zh_cn: 另一位白子对老师居然能到达这里感到惊奇，但同时也警告老师。绫音大声叫喊，让对策委员会一行人前来抓住白子，但白子见状后以手榴弹为掩护，立刻跑掉了。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

name.en: 方舟的計算與躍遷能力
name.jp: 方舟的計算與躍遷能力
name.zh_cn: 方舟的计算与跃迁能力

desc.en: 莉音敏銳地感覺出另一位白子的實時位置跳躍似乎是依靠方舟強大的計算能力所實現，因而只要保住它的計算能力，製作出一個空間跳躍程式並不是問題。她繼而指出，這樣就能讓所有人安全回到地面。
desc.jp: 莉音敏銳地感覺出另一位白子的實時位置跳躍似乎是依靠方舟強大的計算能力所實現，因而只要保住它的計算能力，製作出一個空間跳躍程式並不是問題。她繼而指出，這樣就能讓所有人安全回到地面。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央敏锐地感觉出另一位白子的实时位置跳跃似乎是依靠方舟强大的计算能力所实现，因而只要保住它的计算能力，制作出一个空间跳跃程序并不是问题。她继而指出，这样就能让所有人安全回到地面。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音敏锐地感觉出另一位白子的实时位置跳跃似乎是依靠方舟强大的计算能力所实现，因而只要保住它的计算能力，制作出一个空间跳跃程序并不是问题。她继而指出，这样就能让所有人安全回到地面。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央敏锐地感觉出另一位白子的实时位置跳跃似乎是依靠方舟强大的计算能力所实现，因而只要保住它的计算能力，制作出一个空间跳跃程序并不是问题。她继而指出，这样就能让所有人安全回到地面。

hobby.jp: 今日の運勢の確認、オカルト全般
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物

desc.en: 陽葵讀出了莉音的意思：她自己似乎也無法修復這艘船。陽葵表示莉音這種心態就像之前提到過的那位國王一般，因他自己對他人的不信任而引發了諸多問題。莉音表示同意，但同時說這點恐怕很難改變；陽葵則澄清她只是純粹討厭，並非鄙視。
desc.jp: 陽葵讀出了莉音的意思：她自己似乎也無法修復這艘船。陽葵表示莉音這種心態就像之前提到過的那位國王一般，因他自己對他人的不信任而引發了諸多問題。莉音表示同意，但同時說這點恐怕很難改變；陽葵則澄清她只是純粹討厭，並非鄙視。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠读出了莉央的意思：她自己似乎也无法修复这艘船。日鞠表示莉央这种心态就像之前提到过的那位国王一般，因他自己对他人的不信任而引发了诸多问题。莉央表示同意，但同时说这点恐怕很难改变；日鞠则澄清她只是纯粹讨厌，并非鄙视。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵读出了莉音的意思：她自己似乎也无法修复这艘船。阳葵表示莉音这种心态就像之前提到过的那位国王一般，因他自己对他人的不信任而引发了诸多问题。莉音表示同意，但同时说这点恐怕很难改变；阳葵则澄清她只是纯粹讨厌，并非鄙视。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠读出了莉央的意思：她自己似乎也无法修复这艘船。日鞠表示莉央这种心态就像之前提到过的那位国王一般，因他自己对他人的不信任而引发了诸多问题。莉央表示同意，但同时说这点恐怕很难改变；日鞠则澄清她只是纯粹讨厌，并非鄙视。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 貝裡塔斯在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中準備了自爆程式。但生命守護者早已被敵人駭入了。奇普託斯的天空再次染紅且陷入絕望當中，白子和老師抵達了駭入生命守護者的位置，在那邊遇見了誘騙者和另一個白子。
desc.jp: 貝裡塔斯在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中準備了自爆程式。但生命守護者早已被敵人駭入了。奇普託斯的天空再次染紅且陷入絕望當中，白子和老師抵達了駭入生命守護者的位置，在那邊遇見了誘騙者和另一個白子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理社在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中准备了自爆程序。但生命守护者早已被敌人骇入了。奇普托斯的天空再次染红且陷入绝望当中，白子和老师抵达了骇入生命守护者的位置，在那边遇见了诱骗者和另一个白子。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 贝里塔斯在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中准备了自爆程序。但生命守护者早已被敌人骇入了。奇普托斯的天空再次染红且陷入绝望当中，白子和老师抵达了骇入生命守护者的位置，在那边遇见了诱骗者和另一个白子。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真理会在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中准备了自爆程序。但生命守护者早已被敌人骇入了。奇普托斯的天空再次染红且陷入绝望当中，白子和老师抵达了骇入生命守护者的位置，在那边遇见了诱骗者和另一个白子。

desc.en: 船上，優香向陽葵詢問情況，陽葵則表示他們中了敵人的計：在他們佔領方舟時，敵人也在反向駭入生命守護者艦艇並已成功。優香表示這必須透過物理手段達到，但並沒有人來過這——除了一個人。
desc.jp: 船上，優香向陽葵詢問情況，陽葵則表示他們中了敵人的計：在他們佔領方舟時，敵人也在反向駭入生命守護者艦艇並已成功。優香表示這必須透過物理手段達到，但並沒有人來過這——除了一個人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 船上，优香向日鞠询问情况，日鞠则表示他们中了敌人的计：在他们占领方舟时，敌人也在反向骇入生命守护者舰艇并已成功。优香表示这必须通过物理手段达到，但并没有人来过这——除了一个人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 船上，优香向阳葵询问情况，阳葵则表示他们中了敌人的计：在他们占领方舟时，敌人也在反向骇入生命守护者舰艇并已成功。优香表示这必须通过物理手段达到，但并没有人来过这——除了一个人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 船上，优香向日鞠询问情况，日鞠则表示他们中了敌人的计：在他们占领方舟时，敌人也在反向骇入生命守护者舰艇并已成功。优香表示这必须通过物理手段达到，但并没有人来过这——除了一个人。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 兩人記起那一位白子同學來，認定大概就是在那個時候。
desc.jp: 兩人記起那一位白子同學來，認定大概就是在那個時候。
desc.zh_cn: 两人记起那一位白子同学来，认定大概就是在那个时候。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 陽葵同時表示，現在他們不僅喪失對戰艦的控制，戰艦甚至還在協助方舟進行多次元詮釋。她警告說，這樣聖塔很有可能再度出現。
desc.jp: 陽葵同時表示，現在他們不僅喪失對戰艦的控制，戰艦甚至還在協助方舟進行多次元詮釋。她警告說，這樣聖塔很有可能再度出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠同时表示，现在他们不仅丧失对战舰的控制，战舰甚至还在协助方舟进行多次元诠释。她警告说，这样圣塔很有可能再度出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵同时表示，现在他们不仅丧失对战舰的控制，战舰甚至还在协助方舟进行多次元诠释。她警告说，这样圣塔很有可能再度出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠同时表示，现在他们不仅丧失对战舰的控制，战舰甚至还在协助方舟进行多次元诠释。她警告说，这样圣塔很有可能再度出现。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 白子遇見了誘騙者，她大喊他就是將她綁架的人。白子讓誘騙者不要輕舉妄動，畢竟夏萊的老師可是也在場上。誘騙者沒做什麼，說出了啟動箱子的密碼。白子立刻開槍。
desc.jp: 白子遇見了誘騙者，她大喊他就是將她綁架的人。白子讓誘騙者不要輕舉妄動，畢竟夏萊的老師可是也在場上。誘騙者沒做什麼，說出了啟動箱子的密碼。白子立刻開槍。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 白子遇见了诱骗者，她大喊他就是将她绑架的人。白子让诱骗者不要轻举妄动，毕竟夏莱的老师可是也在场上。诱骗者没做什么，说出了启动箱子的密码。白子立刻开枪。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 白子遇见了诱骗者，她大喊他就是将她绑架的人。白子让诱骗者不要轻举妄动，毕竟夏莱的老师可是也在场上。诱骗者没做什么，说出了启动箱子的密码。白子立刻开枪。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 白子遇见了诱骗者，她大喊他就是将她绑架的人。白子让诱骗者不要轻举妄动，毕竟沙勒的老师可是也在场上。诱骗者没做什么，说出了启动箱子的密码。白子立刻开枪。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: 一片煙中，白子發現子彈全部沒有命中，令她大為震驚。這時，老師聽見了自己和疑似彩奈的名字――是對方的，箱子。
desc.jp: 一片煙中，白子發現子彈全部沒有命中，令她大為震驚。這時，老師聽見了自己和疑似彩奈的名字――是對方的，箱子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 一片烟中，白子发现子弹全部没有命中，令她大为震惊。这时，老师听见了自己和疑似阿罗娜的名字――是对方的，箱子。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 一片烟中，白子发现子弹全部没有命中，令她大为震惊。这时，老师听见了自己和疑似彩奈的名字――是对方的，箱子。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 一片烟中，白子发现子弹全部没有命中，令她大为震惊。这时，老师听见了自己和疑似阿洛娜的名字――是对方的，箱子。

long.jp: アビドス高等学校

hobby.zh_cn_tw: 慢跑、体力训练、公路自行车
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 慢跑、体能训练、骑自行车

desc.en: A.R.O.N.A.宣佈方舟的修復程式啟動，並且被入侵的生命守護者也將在800秒後啟動最終自爆程式。另一位白子向老師冷冰冰地宣告基沃託斯迎向終結的不可避性，並對著誘騙者稱呼老師的名字。
desc.jp: A.R.O.N.A.宣佈方舟的修復程式啟動，並且被入侵的生命守護者也將在800秒後啟動最終自爆程式。另一位白子向老師冷冰冰地宣告基沃託斯迎向終結的不可避性，並對著誘騙者稱呼老師的名字。
desc.zh_cn: A.R.O.N.A.宣布方舟的修复程序启动，并且被入侵的生命守护者也将在800秒后启动最终自爆程序。另一位白子向老师冷冰冰地宣告基沃托斯迎向终结的不可避性，并对着诱骗者称呼老师的名字。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

name.jp: 阿特拉哈西斯的方舟佔領戰開始
name.zh_cn: 阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战开始

desc.en: 老師和學生們進入了阿特拉哈西斯內部。總共分為4個區域的阿特拉哈西斯的方舟佔領戰開始了。
desc.jp: 老師和學生們進入了阿特拉哈西斯內部。總共分為4個區域的阿特拉哈西斯的方舟佔領戰開始了。
desc.zh_cn: 老师和学生们进入了阿特拉哈西斯内部。总共分为4个区域的阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战开始了。

desc.en: 貝里塔斯開始主持對佔領戰的會議，指出其核心要點在於在有限的時間內獲得方舟的控制權。
desc.jp: 貝里塔斯開始主持對佔領戰的會議，指出其核心要點在於在有限的時間內獲得方舟的控制權。
desc.zh_cn: 贝里塔斯开始主持对占领战的会议，指出其核心要点在于在有限的时间内获得方舟的控制权。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.jp: 千尋一針見血的指出，整個方舟本身就是一臺量子電腦，其中可進行多次元詮釋。
desc.zh_cn: 千寻一针见血的指出，整个方舟本身就是一台量子电脑，其中可进行多次元诠释。

desc.en: 在一點點佔領方舟並接管系統後，千尋指出，就可啟動方舟的自爆系統。由於先前愛麗絲對防護罩的破壞，方舟目前無法進行多次元詮釋計算，但其抑制時間有限，超過後可能就再無法與方舟接觸。
desc.jp: 在一點點佔領方舟並接管系統後，千尋指出，就可啟動方舟的自爆系統。由於先前愛麗絲對防護罩的破壞，方舟目前無法進行多次元詮釋計算，但其抑制時間有限，超過後可能就再無法與方舟接觸。
desc.zh_cn: 在一点点占领方舟并接管系统后，千寻指出，就可启动方舟的自爆系统。由于先前爱丽丝对防护罩的破坏，方舟目前无法进行多次元诠释计算，但其抑制时间有限，超过后可能就再无法与方舟接触。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: 小玉解釋方舟的結構。方舟整體為一個圓形，外側有三個區域，中間有一核心區域；當前，大家的方舟卡在第一區域，因而需要依此逐個突破。各個地區均設有次元引擎，將四個地區的次元引擎控制後即可引爆方舟，任務結束。
desc.jp: 小玉解釋方舟的結構。方舟整體為一個圓形，外側有三個區域，中間有一核心區域；當前，大家的方舟卡在第一區域，因而需要依此逐個突破。各個地區均設有次元引擎，將四個地區的次元引擎控制後即可引爆方舟，任務結束。
desc.zh_cn: 小玉解释方舟的结构。方舟整体为一个圆形，外侧有三个区域，中间有一核心区域；当前，大家的方舟卡在第一区域，因而需要依此逐个突破。各个地区均设有次元引擎，将四个地区的次元引擎控制后即可引爆方舟，任务结束。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 成功突入方舟後，「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占領戰」正式開始。與次元引擎及其守護者展開的激戰──究竟，在這場戰鬥的盡頭等待著的會是什麼呢……？
desc.jp: 成功突入方舟後，「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占領戰」正式開始。與次元引擎及其守護者展開的激戰──究竟，在這場戰鬥的盡頭等待著的會是什麼呢……？
